name: C_DEFINED_OBJECT
documentation: Abstract parent type of `C_OBJECT` subtypes that are defined by value, i.e. whose definitions are actually in the archetype rather than being by reference.

default_value.name: default_value
default_value.documentation: Default value set in a template, and present in an operational template. Generally limited to leaf and near-leaf nodes.

any_allowed.name: any_allowed
any_allowed.documentation: True if any value (i.e. instance) of the reference model type would be allowed. Redefined in descendants.

valid_value.name: valid_value
valid_value.documentation: True if `_a_value_` is valid with respect to constraint expressed in concrete instance of this type.

prototype_value.name: prototype_value
prototype_value.documentation: Generate a prototype value from this constraint object.

has_default_value.name: has_default_value
has_default_value.documentation: True if there is an assumed value.
